history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER driving directions
TTS <speak> No problem. <break strength='strong' /> I will give you driving directions to your destination. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where are you going?
USER Atwood
TTS Okay, going to atwood st. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER 15 Highland
TTS Where would you like to leave from?
USER n Highland
TTS Okay, leaving from n highland avenue. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Okay, travelling at 05:00 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER no.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 3 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 16 minutes.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Head south on north Highland avenue toward St Marie St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right onto Station St. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Continue onto north Euclid avenue. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Slight right onto south Euclid avenue. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER s
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should S Euclid avenue turns right and becomes Baum Blvd. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
